import React, {Component} from 'react' import ReactDOM from 'react-dom' import App from './app' import Test1 from './view/test1' import Test2 from './view/test2' import {createStore, applyMiddleware, compose} from 'redux' import thunk from 'redux-thunk' // 异步 import {counter} from './index.redux' const store = createStore(counter, compose( applyMiddleware(thunk), window.devToolsExtension ? window.devToolsExtension() : f => f ) ) // const store = createStore(counter, applyMiddleware(thunk)) function render() { ReactDOM.render(
, document.getElementById('root')) } render() store.subscribe(render) // ReactDOM.render(, document.getElementById('root'))
